title: Ruby SSL certificate for gems: The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
When trying to install ruby with spack, the installation fails, because the SSL certificate for the gems cannot be downloaded

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install ruby
```

### Error Message

```
==> Fetching https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rubygems/rubygems/master/lib/rubygems/ssl_certs/index.rubygems.org/GlobalSignRootCA.pem

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rubygems/rubygems/master/lib/rubygems/ssl_certs/index.rubygems.org/GlobalSignRootCA.pem failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for resource-rubygems-updated-ssl-cert-fcjtmhbrtxbtw6xb3yfv5z7zr66m6gvl
FetchError: FetchError: All fetchers failed for resource-rubygems-updated-ssl-cert-fcjtmhbrtxbtw6xb3yfv5z7zr66m6gvl

/cluster/apps/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1028, in do_fetch:
     25                                     self.spec.format('$_$@'), ck_msg)
     26
     27            self.stage.create()
  >> 28            self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
     29            self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
     30
     31            if spack.do_checksum and self.version in self.versions:


[spackapps@eu-a6-012-23 scripts]$ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rubygems/rubygems/master/lib/rubygems/ssl_certs/index.rubygems.org/GlobalSignRootCA.pem
--2021-05-06 14:37:33--  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rubygems/rubygems/master/lib/rubygems/ssl_certs/index.rubygems.org/GlobalSignRootCA.pem
Resolving proxy.ethz.ch... 129.132.202.155
Connecting to proxy.ethz.ch|129.132.202.155|:3128... connected.
Proxy request sent, awaiting response... 404 Not Found
2021-05-06 14:37:33 ERROR 404: Not Found.
```
